name: ozmeta.exporter.contract
description: Deterministic contract for SQL exporter queries to produce snapshot JSON.
principles: Each query returns a stable set of columns with stable names and types.
Filter by (CL_Code, PJ_Code) and _DeleteDate IS NULL by default.
Order results deterministically by primary natural keys.

queries.name: client_project_context
queries.purpose: Resolve CL_ID and PJ_ID and versions (optional).
queries.sql: SELECT c.CL_ID, c.CL_Code, p.PJ_ID, p.PJ_Code FROM Meta.Client c JOIN Meta.Project p ON p.CL_ID=c.CL_ID WHERE c.CL_Code=@CL_Code AND p.PJ_Code=@PJ_Code AND c._DeleteDate IS NULL AND p._DeleteDate IS NULL;

queries.name: tables
queries.sql: SELECT TB_ID, PJ_ID, TB_SchemaName, TB_TableName, CD_Code, TB_TableType, TB_TextKeyID, TB_Description, TB_IsActual, TB_IsForecast, TB_RequiresTenant, TB_SoftDeleteEnabled, TB_SourceTrackingEnabled FROM Meta.Table WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY TB_SchemaName, TB_TableName;

queries.name: fields
queries.sql: SELECT f.FD_ID, f.TB_ID, f.FD_FieldName, f.LT_Code, f.FD_IsPK, f.FD_IsFK, f.FD_IsInternal, f.FD_IsNullable, f.FD_DefaultRule, f.FD_Sensitivity, f.FD_TextKeyID, e.EN_Code AS EnumCode, f.FD_Format, f.FD_Mask, f.FD_Description FROM Meta.Field f JOIN Meta.Table t ON t.TB_ID=f.TB_ID AND t._DeleteDate IS NULL LEFT JOIN Meta.Enum e ON e.EN_ID=f.FD_EnumID AND e._DeleteDate IS NULL WHERE t.PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND f._DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY t.TB_SchemaName, t.TB_TableName, f.FD_FieldName;

queries.name: relations
queries.sql: SELECT RL_ID, RL_FromFD_ID, RL_ToFD_ID, RL_RoleName, RL_Cardinality, RL_EnforceInDB, RL_TextKeyID, RL_Description FROM Meta.Relation WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND (RL_FromFD_ID IN (SELECT FD_ID FROM Meta.Field f JOIN Meta.Table t ON t.TB_ID=f.TB_ID WHERE t.PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND t._DeleteDate IS NULL AND f._DeleteDate IS NULL));

queries.name: texts
queries.purpose: Languages, TextKeys, Translations used in project scope.
queries.sql: SELECT LG_Code, LG_Name, LG_IsDefault FROM Meta.Language WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND LG_IsEnabled=1 ORDER BY LG_IsDefault DESC, LG_Code;

queries.name: workflows
queries.sql: SELECT WF_ID, PJ_ID, WF_Code, WF_ObjectType, WF_ObjectID, WF_TextKeyID, WF_IsEnabled, WF_Notes FROM Meta.Workflow WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY WF_Code;

queries.name: workflow_states
queries.purpose: Workflow states for workflows in project.
queries.sql: SELECT WS_ID, WF_ID, WS_Code, WS_IsStart, WS_IsTerminal, WS_TextKeyID, WS_Notes FROM Meta.WorkflowState WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND WF_ID IN (SELECT WF_ID FROM Meta.Workflow WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY WF_ID, WS_Code;

queries.name: workflow_transitions
queries.purpose: Workflow transitions for workflows in project.
queries.sql: SELECT WT_ID, WF_ID, WT_FromWS_ID, WT_ToWS_ID, WT_Code, WT_TextKeyID, WT_GuardLogical, WT_ActionLogical, WT_IsEnabled, WT_Notes FROM Meta.WorkflowTransition WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND WF_ID IN (SELECT WF_ID FROM Meta.Workflow WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY WF_ID, WT_Code;

queries.name: workflow_transition_roles
queries.sql: SELECT WTR_ID, WT_ID, RO_ID, WTR_Notes FROM Meta.WorkflowTransitionRole WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND WT_ID IN (SELECT WT_ID FROM Meta.WorkflowTransition WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND WF_ID IN (SELECT WF_ID FROM Meta.Workflow WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL)) ORDER BY WT_ID;

queries.name: security_policies
queries.sql: SELECT SP_ID, PJ_ID, SP_Code, SP_Type, SP_TextKeyID, SP_ExpressionLogical, SP_IsEnabled, SP_Notes FROM Meta.SecurityPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY SP_Code;

queries.name: table_security
queries.sql: SELECT TS_ID, TB_ID, SP_ID, TS_Mode, TS_Notes FROM Meta.TableSecurity WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND TB_ID IN (SELECT TB_ID FROM Meta.Table WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY TB_ID;

queries.name: field_security
queries.sql: SELECT FS_ID, FD_ID, SP_ID, FS_Action, FS_Notes FROM Meta.FieldSecurity WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND FD_ID IN (SELECT f.FD_ID FROM Meta.Field f JOIN Meta.Table t ON t.TB_ID=f.TB_ID WHERE t.PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND t._DeleteDate IS NULL AND f._DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY FD_ID;

queries.name: data_protection_policies
queries.sql: SELECT DP_ID, PJ_ID, DP_Code, DP_Type, DP_TextKeyID, DP_Algorithm, DP_KeyRef, DP_ExpressionLogical, DP_IsEnabled, DP_Notes FROM Meta.DataProtectionPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY DP_Code;

queries.name: field_protection
queries.sql: SELECT FP_ID, FD_ID, DP_ID, FP_Mode, FP_Notes FROM Meta.FieldProtection WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND FD_ID IN (SELECT f.FD_ID FROM Meta.Field f JOIN Meta.Table t ON t.TB_ID=f.TB_ID WHERE t.PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND t._DeleteDate IS NULL AND f._DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY FD_ID;

queries.name: runtime_bindings
queries.sql: SELECT RB_ID, PJ_ID, RB_ObjectType, RB_ObjectID, WF_ID, AF_ID, RB_RuntimeMode, RB_InstanceKeyStrategy, RB_TextKeyID, RB_IsEnabled, RB_Notes FROM Meta.RuntimeBinding WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY RB_ObjectType, RB_ObjectID;

queries.name: runtime_sla_bindings
queries.purpose: RuntimeSlaBinding rules for project runtime bindings.
queries.sql: SELECT RSB_ID, RB_ID, SL_ID, RSB_StartRule, RSB_StopRule, RSB_Notes FROM Meta.RuntimeSlaBinding WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND RB_ID IN (SELECT RB_ID FROM Meta.RuntimeBinding WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY RB_ID;

queries.name: runtime_signal_types
queries.sql: SELECT RST_ID, PJ_ID, RST_Code, RST_TextKeyID, RST_Severity, RST_DefaultRetentionDays, RST_Notes FROM Meta.RuntimeSignalType WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY RST_Code;

queries.name: sla_policies
queries.sql: SELECT SL_ID, PJ_ID, SL_Code, SL_ObjectType, SL_ObjectID, SL_TextKeyID, SL_TargetMinutes, SL_WarnMinutes, SL_EscalationRule, SL_IsEnabled, SL_Notes FROM Meta.SlaPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY SL_Code;

queries.name: roles
queries.sql: SELECT RO_ID, PJ_ID, RO_Code, RO_TextKeyID, RO_Notes FROM Meta.Role WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY RO_Code;

queries.name: source_systems
queries.sql: SELECT SS_ID, PJ_ID, SS_Code, SS_Type, SS_TextKeyID, SS_Owner, SS_TrustLevel, SS_AuthProfileRef, SS_ConfigJSON, SS_IsEnabled, SS_Notes FROM Meta.SourceSystem WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY SS_Code;

queries.name: source_objects
queries.sql: SELECT SO_ID, SS_ID, SO_ObjectType, SO_SchemaName, SO_ObjectName, SO_PrimaryKeySpec, SO_TextKeyID, SO_ConfigJSON FROM Meta.SourceObject WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SS_ID IN (SELECT SS_ID FROM Meta.SourceSystem WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY SS_ID, SO_ObjectName;

queries.name: source_fields
queries.purpose: Source fields for project source objects.
queries.sql: SELECT SF_ID, SO_ID, SF_FieldName, SF_DataType, SF_IsNullable, SF_TextKeyID, SF_Description, SF_ConfigJSON FROM Meta.SourceField WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SO_ID IN (SELECT SO_ID FROM Meta.SourceObject WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SS_ID IN (SELECT SS_ID FROM Meta.SourceSystem WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL)) ORDER BY SO_ID, SF_FieldName;

queries.name: map_versions
queries.sql: SELECT MV_ID, PJ_ID, MV_Code, MV_Version, MV_Status, MV_Notes FROM Meta.MapVersion WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY MV_Code, MV_Version;

queries.name: map_fields
queries.sql: SELECT MF_ID, MV_ID, SF_ID, FD_ID, MF_TransformDSL, MF_QualityRuleDSL, MF_SurvivorshipDSL, MF_Notes FROM Meta.MapField WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND MV_ID IN (SELECT MV_ID FROM Meta.MapVersion WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY MV_ID;

queries.name: ingestion_specs
queries.sql: SELECT IS_ID, MV_ID, SO_ID, IS_Mode, IS_CdcSpecJSON, IS_ScheduleSpec, IS_DedupeDSL, IS_ConflictDSL, IS_OutputTarget, IS_Notes FROM Meta.IngestionSpec WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND MV_ID IN (SELECT MV_ID FROM Meta.MapVersion WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY MV_ID;

queries.name: dq_rules
queries.sql: SELECT DQ_ID, PJ_ID, DQ_Code, DQ_ObjectType, DQ_ObjectID, DQ_Severity, DQ_RuleDSL, DQ_RemediationDSL, DQ_TextKeyID, DQ_IsEnabled, DQ_Notes FROM Meta.DataQualityRule WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY DQ_Code;

queries.name: dataset_certifications
queries.sql: SELECT DC_ID, PJ_ID, DC_ObjectType, DC_ObjectID, CF_Code, DC_TextKeyID, DC_Notes, DC_EffectiveUTC FROM Meta.DatasetCertification WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY DC_EffectiveUTC DESC;

queries.name: document_types
queries.sql: SELECT DT_ID, PJ_ID, DT_Code, DT_TextKeyID, DT_ConfigJSON, DT_IsEnabled, DT_Notes FROM Meta.DocumentType WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY DT_Code;

queries.name: redaction_policies
queries.sql: SELECT RP_ID, PJ_ID, RP_Code, RP_RuleDSL, RP_TextKeyID, RP_IsEnabled, RP_Notes FROM Meta.RedactionPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY RP_Code;

queries.name: event_buses
queries.sql: SELECT EB_ID, PJ_ID, EB_Code, EB_Provider, EB_ConfigRef, EB_ConfigJSON, EB_IsEnabled FROM Meta.EventBus WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY EB_Code;

queries.name: event_channels
queries.purpose: Event channels for project event buses.
queries.sql: SELECT EC_ID, EB_ID, EC_Code, EC_Mode, EC_TextKeyID, EC_ConfigJSON FROM Meta.EventChannel WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND EB_ID IN (SELECT EB_ID FROM Meta.EventBus WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY EB_ID, EC_Code;

queries.name: event_subscriptions
queries.sql: SELECT ES_ID, EC_ID, ES_ConsumerCode, ES_FilterDSL, ES_DeliverySpec, ES_IsEnabled FROM Meta.EventSubscription WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND EC_ID IN (SELECT EC_ID FROM Meta.EventChannel WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND EB_ID IN (SELECT EB_ID FROM Meta.EventBus WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL)) ORDER BY EC_ID, ES_ConsumerCode;

queries.name: semantic_models
queries.sql: SELECT SM_ID, PJ_ID, SM_Code, SM_Platform, SM_TextKeyID, SM_ConfigJSON, SM_IsEnabled, SM_Notes FROM Meta.SemanticModel WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY SM_Code;

queries.name: semantic_measures
queries.purpose: Semantic measures for project semantic models.
queries.sql: SELECT SMR_ID, SM_ID, SMR_Code, SMR_Expression, SMR_Format, SMR_TextKeyID, SMR_Notes FROM Meta.SemanticMeasure WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SM_ID IN (SELECT SM_ID FROM Meta.SemanticModel WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY SM_ID, SMR_Code;

queries.name: features
queries.sql: SELECT FT_ID, PJ_ID, FT_Code, FT_EntityType, FT_ExpressionDSL, FT_FreshnessMin, FT_TextKeyID, FT_IsEnabled, FT_Notes FROM Meta.FeatureDef WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY FT_Code;

queries.name: models
queries.sql: SELECT ML_ID, PJ_ID, ML_Code, ML_Type, ML_Version, ML_TextKeyID, ML_LineageJSON, ML_RiskControlsJSON, ML_IsEnabled, ML_Notes FROM Meta.ModelRegistry WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY ML_Code, ML_Version;

queries.name: environments
queries.sql: SELECT EV_ID, PJ_ID, EV_Code, EV_Type, EV_Region, EV_Platform, EV_ConfigJSON, EV_IsEnabled FROM Meta.Environment WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY EV_Code;

queries.name: deployments
queries.sql: SELECT DS_ID, PJ_ID, DS_Code, DS_ConfigJSON, DS_Notes FROM Meta.DeploymentSpec WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY DS_Code;

queries.name: platform_service_map
queries.sql: SELECT PSM_ID, PSM_Capability, PSM_Azure, PSM_AWS, PSM_GCP, PSM_Notes FROM Meta.PlatformServiceMap ORDER BY PSM_Capability;

queries.name: dr_topologies
queries.sql: SELECT DR_ID, PJ_ID, DR_Code, DR_ConfigJSON, DR_Notes FROM Meta.DrTopology WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY DR_Code;

queries.name: change_requests
queries.sql: SELECT CR_ID, PJ_ID, CR_Code, CR_Title, CR_Status, CR_RiskLevel, CR_ImpactJSON, CR_Notes FROM Meta.ChangeRequest WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY CR_Code;

queries.name: ui_apps
queries.sql: SELECT UA_ID, PJ_ID, UA_Code, UA_TextKeyID, UA_ThemeJSON, UA_ConfigJSON, UA_IsEnabled FROM Meta.UiApp WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY UA_Code;

queries.name: ui_pages
queries.purpose: UI pages for project UI apps.
queries.sql: SELECT UP_ID, UA_ID, UP_Code, UP_Route, UP_LayoutJSON, UP_TextKeyID, UP_IsEnabled FROM Meta.UiPage WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UA_ID IN (SELECT UA_ID FROM Meta.UiApp WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY UA_ID, UP_Code;

queries.name: ui_components
queries.sql: SELECT UC_ID, PJ_ID, UC_Code, UC_Type, UC_SpecJSON, UC_TextKeyID, UC_IsEnabled FROM Meta.UiComponent WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY UC_Code;

queries.name: ui_page_components
queries.sql: SELECT UPC_ID, UP_ID, UC_ID, UPC_Order, UPC_Region, UPC_VisibilityDSL, UPC_TextKeyID FROM Meta.UiPageComponent WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UP_ID IN (SELECT UP_ID FROM Meta.UiPage WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UA_ID IN (SELECT UA_ID FROM Meta.UiApp WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL)) ORDER BY UP_ID, UPC_Order;

queries.name: ui_validation_rules
queries.sql: SELECT UV_ID, PJ_ID, UV_Code, UV_ObjectType, UV_ObjectID, UV_RuleDSL, UV_MessageTextKeyID, UV_Severity, UV_IsEnabled FROM Meta.UiValidationRule WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY UV_Code;

queries.name: ui_search_facets
queries.sql: SELECT UFAC_ID, PJ_ID, UFAC_Code, UFAC_ObjectType, UFAC_ObjectID, UFAC_FieldPath, UFAC_FacetType, UFAC_SortOrder, UFAC_TextKeyID, UFAC_ConfigJSON FROM Meta.UiSearchFacet WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY UFAC_SortOrder, UFAC_Code;

queries.name: retention_policies
queries.sql: SELECT RTN_ID, PJ_ID, RTN_Code, RTN_RetentionDays, RTN_Disposition, RTN_TextKeyID, RTN_ConfigJSON FROM Meta.RetentionPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY RTN_Code;

queries.name: document_policies
queries.sql: SELECT DPL_ID, DT_ID, RTN_ID, DPL_IntegrityMode, DPL_RedactionPolicyID, DPL_WatermarkPolicyJSON, DPL_ConfigJSON FROM Meta.DocumentPolicy WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND DT_ID IN (SELECT DT_ID FROM Meta.DocumentType WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY DT_ID;

queries.name: data_assets
queries.sql: SELECT DA_ID, PJ_ID, DA_AssetType, DA_LogicalName, DA_PhysicalRef, DA_TextKeyID, DA_Notes FROM Meta.DataAsset WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY DA_AssetType, DA_LogicalName;

queries.name: lineage_edges
queries.sql: SELECT LE_ID, PJ_ID, LE_FromDA_ID, LE_ToDA_ID, LE_TransformDSL, LE_Notes FROM Meta.LineageEdge WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY LE_FromDA_ID, LE_ToDA_ID;

queries.name: job_runs
queries.sql: SELECT JR_ID, PJ_ID, JB_ID, JR_RunKey, JR_Status, JR_StartUTC, JR_EndUTC, JR_MetricsJSON, JR_ErrorJSON FROM Meta.JobRun WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY JR_StartUTC DESC;

queries.name: job_run_assets
queries.sql: SELECT JRA_ID, JR_ID, DA_ID, JRA_Role, JRA_StatsJSON FROM Meta.JobRunAsset WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND JR_ID IN (SELECT JR_ID FROM Meta.JobRun WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY JR_ID;

queries.name: sync_policies
queries.sql: SELECT SY_ID, PJ_ID, SY_Code, SY_ObjectType, SY_ObjectID, SY_Mode, SY_MergeDSL, SY_IdempotencyKeySpec, SY_IsEnabled, SY_Notes FROM Meta.SyncPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY SY_Code;

queries.name: fact_tables
queries.sql: SELECT FTBL_ID, PJ_ID, FTBL_Code, TB_ID, FTBL_GrainJSON, FTBL_IsSnapshot, FTBL_TextKeyID, FTBL_Notes FROM Meta.FactTable WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY FTBL_Code;

queries.name: dimension_tables
queries.sql: SELECT DMT_ID, PJ_ID, DMT_Code, TB_ID, DMT_ScdType, DMT_NaturalKeySpec, DMT_TextKeyID, DMT_Notes FROM Meta.DimensionTable WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY DMT_Code;

queries.name: partition_specs
queries.sql: SELECT PS_ID, PJ_ID, PS_ObjectType, PS_ObjectID, PS_Strategy, PS_SpecJSON, PS_Notes FROM Meta.PartitionSpec WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY PS_ObjectType;

queries.name: text_keys_project
queries.purpose: All TextKeys referenced by the project (deterministic union).
queries.sql:
WITH tk AS (
  SELECT TK_ID FROM Meta.Project WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND PJ_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT TB_TextKeyID FROM Meta.Table WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND TB_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT FD_TextKeyID FROM Meta.Field f JOIN Meta.Table t ON t.TB_ID=f.TB_ID WHERE t.PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND t._DeleteDate IS NULL AND f._DeleteDate IS NULL AND f.FD_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT WF_TextKeyID FROM Meta.Workflow WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND WF_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT WS_TextKeyID FROM Meta.WorkflowState WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND WF_ID IN (SELECT WF_ID FROM Meta.Workflow WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) AND WS_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT WT_TextKeyID FROM Meta.WorkflowTransition WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND WF_ID IN (SELECT WF_ID FROM Meta.Workflow WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) AND WT_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT SP_TextKeyID FROM Meta.SecurityPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SP_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT DP_TextKeyID FROM Meta.DataProtectionPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND DP_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT SL_TextKeyID FROM Meta.SlaPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SL_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT RO_TextKeyID FROM Meta.Role WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND RO_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT DT_TextKeyID FROM Meta.DocumentType WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND DT_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT RP_TextKeyID FROM Meta.RedactionPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND RP_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT RTN_TextKeyID FROM Meta.RetentionPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND RTN_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT UA_TextKeyID FROM Meta.UiApp WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UA_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT UP_TextKeyID FROM Meta.UiPage WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UA_ID IN (SELECT UA_ID FROM Meta.UiApp WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) AND UP_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT UC_TextKeyID FROM Meta.UiComponent WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UC_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT UPC_TextKeyID FROM Meta.UiPageComponent WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UP_ID IN (SELECT UP_ID FROM Meta.UiPage WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UA_ID IN (SELECT UA_ID FROM Meta.UiApp WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL)) AND UPC_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT UV_MessageTextKeyID FROM Meta.UiValidationRule WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UV_MessageTextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT UFAC_TextKeyID FROM Meta.UiSearchFacet WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UFAC_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT SM_TextKeyID FROM Meta.SemanticModel WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SM_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT SMR_TextKeyID FROM Meta.SemanticMeasure WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SM_ID IN (SELECT SM_ID FROM Meta.SemanticModel WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) AND SMR_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT FT_TextKeyID FROM Meta.FeatureDef WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND FT_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT ML_TextKeyID FROM Meta.ModelRegistry WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND ML_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  UNION SELECT DA_TextKeyID FROM Meta.DataAsset WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND DA_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT k.TK_ID, k.TK_Code, k.TK_DefaultText, k.TK_Notes
FROM Meta.TextKey k
JOIN tk ON tk.TK_ID = k.TK_ID
WHERE k._DeleteDate IS NULL
ORDER BY k.TK_Code;

queries.name: translations_project
queries.purpose: Translations for TextKeys referenced by the project.
queries.sql:
WITH tk AS (
  SELECT k.TK_ID
  FROM (
    SELECT TK_ID FROM Meta.Project WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND PJ_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT TB_TextKeyID FROM Meta.Table WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND TB_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT FD_TextKeyID FROM Meta.Field f JOIN Meta.Table t ON t.TB_ID=f.TB_ID WHERE t.PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND t._DeleteDate IS NULL AND f._DeleteDate IS NULL AND f.FD_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT WF_TextKeyID FROM Meta.Workflow WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND WF_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT WS_TextKeyID FROM Meta.WorkflowState WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND WF_ID IN (SELECT WF_ID FROM Meta.Workflow WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) AND WS_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT WT_TextKeyID FROM Meta.WorkflowTransition WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND WF_ID IN (SELECT WF_ID FROM Meta.Workflow WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) AND WT_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT SP_TextKeyID FROM Meta.SecurityPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SP_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT DP_TextKeyID FROM Meta.DataProtectionPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND DP_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT SL_TextKeyID FROM Meta.SlaPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SL_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT RO_TextKeyID FROM Meta.Role WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND RO_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT DT_TextKeyID FROM Meta.DocumentType WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND DT_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT RP_TextKeyID FROM Meta.RedactionPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND RP_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT RTN_TextKeyID FROM Meta.RetentionPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND RTN_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT UA_TextKeyID FROM Meta.UiApp WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UA_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT UP_TextKeyID FROM Meta.UiPage WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UA_ID IN (SELECT UA_ID FROM Meta.UiApp WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) AND UP_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT UC_TextKeyID FROM Meta.UiComponent WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UC_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT UPC_TextKeyID FROM Meta.UiPageComponent WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UP_ID IN (SELECT UP_ID FROM Meta.UiPage WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UA_ID IN (SELECT UA_ID FROM Meta.UiApp WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL)) AND UPC_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT UV_MessageTextKeyID FROM Meta.UiValidationRule WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UV_MessageTextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT UFAC_TextKeyID FROM Meta.UiSearchFacet WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND UFAC_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT SM_TextKeyID FROM Meta.SemanticModel WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SM_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT SMR_TextKeyID FROM Meta.SemanticMeasure WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SM_ID IN (SELECT SM_ID FROM Meta.SemanticModel WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) AND SMR_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT FT_TextKeyID FROM Meta.FeatureDef WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND FT_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT ML_TextKeyID FROM Meta.ModelRegistry WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND ML_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
    UNION SELECT DA_TextKeyID FROM Meta.DataAsset WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL AND DA_TextKeyID IS NOT NULL
  ) x
  JOIN Meta.TextKey k ON k.TK_ID = x.TK_ID
  WHERE k._DeleteDate IS NULL
)
SELECT tr.TR_ID, tr.TK_ID, tr.LG_Code, tr.TR_Text, tr.TR_Notes
FROM Meta.Translation tr
JOIN tk ON tk.TK_ID = tr.TK_ID
WHERE tr._DeleteDate IS NULL
ORDER BY tr.LG_Code, tr.TK_ID;

queries.name: project_languages
queries.sql: SELECT PL_ID, PJ_ID, LG_Code, PL_IsDefault, PL_IsRequired, PL_Notes FROM Meta.ProjectLanguage WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY PL_IsDefault DESC, LG_Code;

queries.name: text_usage
queries.purpose: Explicit TextKey usage bindings (preferred over unions when present).
queries.sql: SELECT TU_ID, PJ_ID, TU_ObjectType, TU_ObjectID, TU_PropertyName, TK_ID, TU_Notes FROM Meta.TextUsage WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY TU_ObjectType, TU_PropertyName;

queries.name: search_indexes
queries.sql: SELECT SI_ID, PJ_ID, SI_Code, SI_Platform, SI_ConfigJSON, SI_TextKeyID, SI_IsEnabled FROM Meta.SearchIndex WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY SI_Code;

queries.name: search_fields
queries.sql: SELECT SFN_ID, SI_ID, SFN_FieldPath, SFN_FieldType, SFN_IsKey, SFN_IsFilterable, SFN_IsSortable, SFN_IsFacetable, SFN_Analyzer, SFN_Boost, SFN_TextKeyID, SFN_ConfigJSON FROM Meta.SearchField WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND SI_ID IN (SELECT SI_ID FROM Meta.SearchIndex WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY SI_ID, SFN_FieldPath;

queries.name: graph_models
queries.sql: SELECT GM_ID, PJ_ID, GM_Code, GM_Platform, GM_ConfigJSON, GM_TextKeyID, GM_IsEnabled FROM Meta.GraphModel WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY GM_Code;

queries.name: graph_node_types
queries.sql: SELECT GNT_ID, GM_ID, GNT_Code, GNT_SourceTB_ID, GNT_KeySpec, GNT_TextKeyID, GNT_ConfigJSON FROM Meta.GraphNodeType WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND GM_ID IN (SELECT GM_ID FROM Meta.GraphModel WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY GM_ID, GNT_Code;

queries.name: graph_edge_types
queries.sql: SELECT GET_ID, GM_ID, GET_Code, GET_FromGNT_ID, GET_ToGNT_ID, GET_Direction, GET_ScoreSpecDSL, GET_TextKeyID, GET_ConfigJSON FROM Meta.GraphEdgeType WHERE _DeleteDate IS NULL AND GM_ID IN (SELECT GM_ID FROM Meta.GraphModel WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL) ORDER BY GM_ID, GET_Code;

queries.name: purposes
queries.sql: SELECT PRP_ID, PJ_ID, PRP_Code, PRP_TextKeyID, PRP_Notes, PRP_IsEnabled FROM Meta.Purpose WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY PRP_Code;

queries.name: consent_policies
queries.sql: SELECT CP_ID, PJ_ID, CP_Code, CP_ObjectType, CP_ObjectID, CP_PurposeID, CP_RuleDSL, CP_TextKeyID, CP_IsEnabled FROM Meta.ConsentPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY CP_Code;

queries.name: residency_policies
queries.sql: SELECT RDP_ID, PJ_ID, RDP_Code, RDP_Region, RDP_ObjectType, RDP_ObjectID, RDP_RuleDSL, RDP_TextKeyID, RDP_IsEnabled FROM Meta.ResidencyPolicy WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY RDP_Code;

queries.name: outbox_specs
queries.sql: SELECT OB_ID, PJ_ID, OB_Code, OB_SourceTB_ID, OB_ChannelID, OB_IdempotencyKeySpec, OB_Serializer, OB_ConfigJSON, OB_IsEnabled FROM Meta.OutboxSpec WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY OB_Code;

queries.name: inbox_specs
queries.sql: SELECT IB_ID, PJ_ID, IB_Code, IB_ChannelID, IB_DedupeKeySpec, IB_RetrySpecJSON, IB_ConfigJSON, IB_IsEnabled FROM Meta.InboxSpec WHERE PJ_ID=@PJ_ID AND _DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY IB_Code;

notes: Additional queries can be added for workflows, approvals, SLAs, security policies, runtime bindings, metrics, dimensions, enums, templates, jobs, mappings, sources.
Exporter should be deterministic: stable ordering and stable field selection.
